scripts.build-emote-widget: npm run build && browserify src/overlay-widgets/emote-widget/index.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicityAny ] > build/overlay-widgets/emote-widget/emote-widget-bundle.js && copyfiles -f src/overlay-widgets/emote-widget/*.html src/overlay-widgets/emote-widget/*.css src/overlay-widgets/emote-widget/*.md build/overlay-widgets/emote-widget
scripts.build-keyboard-widget: npm run build && browserify src/overlay-widgets/keyboard-widget/index.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicityAny ] > build/overlay-widgets/keyboard-widget/keyboard-bundle.js && copyfiles -f src/overlay-widgets/keyboard-widget/*.html src/overlay-widgets/keyboard-widget/*.css src/overlay-widgets/keyboard-widget/*.md build/overlay-widgets/keyboard-widget && copyfiles -f src/overlay-widgets/keyboard-widget/*.node build
scripts.build-all: npm test && npm run build-emote-widget && npm run build-physics-widget && npm run build-keyboard-widget
